Posts.Content: according to my ultra sound report  is FNA(Fine needle aspiration is a type of biopsy procedure.)  urgent for me   here ultra sound report ::: "both breasts are normal in size and shape . echo pattern is homogenous in all quadrants except upper-outer quadrant of right breast parenchyma is occupied by echogenic fibrous tissue  interspersed with cystic space - suggesting fibro-cystic change . No fibro-adenoma or soft tissue mass is seen" impression : Fibro-cystic change in right breast parenchyma
Posts.Title: according to my ultra sound report is FNA urgent for me

Posts.Content: i have Fibro-cystic change in right breast parenchyma . doctors prescribed me danazol . but danazol is very costly for me . birth control pill and danazol both have same functionality boths stops ovulation and estrogen what causes Fibro-cystic change in breast. so why not birth control pill instead of danazol where i do not have money to buy danazol
Posts.Title: why danazol vs birthcontroll pill for Fibro-cystic change in right breast parenchyma

Posts.Content: i did ultra sound and got this report .  i took medicine "danamet" means "Danazol USP 100 mg" but it did not work for me . what should i do now ? any more test ? or other medicine      both breasts are normal in size and shape . echo pattern is homogenous in all quadrants except upper-outer quadrant of right breast parenchyma is occupied by echogenic fibrous tissue interspersed with cystic space - suggesting fibro-cystic change . No fibro-adenoma or soft tissue mass is seen     impression : Fibro-cystic change in right breast parenchyma
